text:
MyFinance | Austin, TX | Full-time ONSITE

MyFinance helps consumers discover financial products and services that can improve their economic well-being via a proprietary content and ad tech platform.

We're looking for full-stack developers at all levels. Javascript & Python heavy, Django experience, Angular is preferred but not necessary.

Interview Process: Phone screen, Code challenge, Onsite interview (if local) / video chat interview (if not local)

Website: https://www.myfinance.com Hiring contact: austin@myfinance.com
